text: Shirley Stelfox (11 April 1941 â€“ 7 December 2015) was an English actress. She was best known for her role as Edna Birch on the British soap opera Emmerdale. Stelfox died in Yorkshire Dales, Yorkshire from cancer of unknown primary origin on 7 December 2015, aged 74. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Profile , filmdope.com; accessed 21 November 2015. *Shirley Stelfox (Aveleyman) Category:1941 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer of unknown primary origin Category:Actors from Cheshire Category:Cancer deaths in England Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors
